org.flowvisor.message

Interface Slicable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FVBarrierReply, FVBarrierRequest, FVEchoReply, FVEchoRequest, FVError, FVFeaturesReply, FVFeaturesRequest, FVFlowMod, FVFlowRemoved, FVGetConfigReply, FVGetConfigRequest, FVHello, FVPacketIn, FVPacketOut, FVPortMod, FVPortStatus, FVQueueConfigReply, FVQueueConfigRequest, FVSetConfig, FVStatisticsReply, FVStatisticsRequest, FVUnknownMessage, FVVendor

    public interface Slicable
    Interface for slice specific, message specific rewriting
    Author:
    capveg

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sliceFromController(WorkerSwitch fvClassifier, OriginalSwitch fvSlicer)
      Send a sliced version of this message to the switch Sliced could mean rewritten or not sent at all (if the policy does not allow it)

    • Method Detail

      • sliceFromController

        void sliceFromController(WorkerSwitch fvClassifier,
                       OriginalSwitch fvSlicer)
        Send a sliced version of this message to the switch Sliced could mean rewritten or not sent at all (if the policy does not allow it)
        Parameters:
        fvClassifier - The potential destination
        fvSlicer - The slicing policy and source of the message
